pages.text: Go through the Portal to enter the Mining World.

pages.title: Mining World
pages.text: $(li)PVP enabled$(li)Claims disabled$(li)Access through Portals$(br2)Gets resetted from time to time!$(br2)Don't save your items hear nor logout for a longer time in this dimension!

pages.title: Info
pages.text: In this Dimension you can actually break / place blocks and get Resources.$(br2)Start in this Dimension and get back to the Build World if you feel you have enough for a Starter Base.
